name: my-game-lib
description: A web app to query and save your favorite video games.

scripts.build: cd client && npm run build && cd ../server && npm run build
scripts.start: concurrently "cd client && npm run start" "cd server && npm run start"
scripts.test: cd client && npm run test && cd ../server && npm run test
scripts.dev: concurrently "cd client && npm run start" "cd server && npm run dev"

author: crlimacastro
